Package edu.sru.group3.WebBasedEvaluations.controller

Class AddUserController

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.group3.WebBasedEvaluations.controller.AddUserController
@Controller public class AddUserController extends Object
Class for housing the methods for controlling how to add users via manually/uploading
Author:
Dalton Stenzel

  • Method Details

    • addUser

      @RequestMapping("/adduser/") public String addUser(@Validated User user, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth, String keyword, @RequestParam("perPage") Integer perPage, @RequestParam("sort") String sort, @RequestParam("currPage") Integer currPage, @RequestParam("sortOr") Integer sortOr)
      Method for manually adding users from the admin user page. It calls a few methods from the AdminMethodsService class for checking for any changes, capital letters, spaces, problems, etc,. This method is called when the "Add User" button is pressed.
      Parameters:
      user - is a User object used that holds the information submitted from the "Add User" button
      result - is a BindResult object used in conjunction with "@Validated" tag in order to bind the submission to an object.
      model - is a Model object used for adding attributes to a webpage, mostly used for adding messages and lists to the page.
      keyword - is a String used to hold a particular set of characters being sought after in a list of users.
      perPage - is an Integer value used to store the amount of users to be displayed per page.
      sort - is a String value user to contain the type of sorting to be used on a list of users such as: first name, last name, email, role.
      currPage - is an Integer value used to store the current page number the user was on.
      sortOr - is an Integer value used to determine the order in which the sort will take place: ascending(1) or descending(0).
      Returns:
      admin_users html webpage.

    • uploaduser2

      @RequestMapping(value="/uploaduser2", method=POST) public String uploaduser2(@RequestParam("file") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile reapExcelDataFile, @RequestParam("perPage") Integer perPage, @Validated User users, org.springframework.ui.Model model, String keyword, @RequestParam("sort") String sort, @RequestParam("currPage") Integer currPage, @RequestParam("sortOr") Integer sortOr, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
      Method called when the "Upload Users" button is pressed. It will attempt check the file uploaded, if there is one in the first place, and will log information about users unable to be added. It checks if there was a file selected and also adds messages about when users were or were not successfully added.
      Parameters:
      reapExcelDataFile - is a MultipartFile object
      user - is a User object that is required for the page, other an IllegalStateException error will occur.
      model - is a Model object used for adding attributes to a webpage, mostly used for adding messages and lists to the page.
      keyword - is a String used to hold a particular set of characters being sought after in a list of users.
      perPage - is an Interger value used to store the amount of users to be displayed per page.
      sort - is a String value user to contain the type of sorting to be used on a list of users such as: first name, last name, email, role.
      currPage - is an Integer value used to store the current page number the user was on.
      sortOr - is an Integer value used to determine the order in which the sort will take place: ascending(1) or descending(0).
      Returns:
      admin_users html webpage.
